TopicTitle: Crew Transfer on Kerbin possible but not in space

Articles.Content:
Hi all,

First I play/use Kerbal since starting few years ago.

Now I have a challenge - I Setup a Space Station Part on Kerbin Crew Transfer possibel on the start ramp. (MK1-2 Pod conected via Clampo Tron Docking Port)

But if i am in the space and after docking not Crew Transfer possibel (hatch is open).

Some one any Idea?

Thanks in advance and regards

Christian
